snippet.title: New Season Mode: Secure Ops | Season 7: Secured Gear, No Fear - Arena Breakout
snippet.description:
Still stressing over gear fear? Broke and unwilling to risk your hard-earned loot in Arena Breakout? Say hello to the brand-new Secure Ops mode! Bring whatever gear you want within 80,000 Koen—and keep it all!

In this mode, everything you bring in will be safely returned to you. The only thing you need to care about is finding special keys to unlock rooms and filling up your backpack—yes, even your rigs! Just remember: SECURED GEAR, NO FEAR!

Hop into Secure Ops now, Operators—time to enjoy the fight!

#ArenaBreakout #ArenaBreakoutS7 #SecuredGearNoFear #SecuredOps
